items.title: Breaking down Grok 3: The AI model that could redefine the industry
items.description: Grok-3 still hasn't fully shipped yet. But it will surely set the tone for how other AI labs release future models.

items.title: Xbox’s AI initiative with Muse is an attempt to read the tea leaves, not the room
items.description: Earlier today, the heads of Microsoft’s Xbox division revealed Muse, a generative AI model that intends to create both visuals and gameplay for games....

items.title: A Stytch in time: Connected Apps untangles authorization tie-ups for AI agents
items.description: Stytch Connected Apps enables AI agents and third-party apps to authenticate, access data and take action on behalf of users.

items.title: Crunchbase’s AI can predict startup success with 95% accuracy—will it change investing?

items.title: Muse is Xbox’s generative AI model for gameplay ideation
items.description: Microsoft researchers have created the first generative AI model, Muse, for game ideation.
